analysis.description:
OHC_Crowdsale.totalSupplyIco (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol#463-464) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- validPurchase (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol#479-510)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol#372-386) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol#384)

OHC_Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol#510-530) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol#525)

OHC_Crowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(walletToMint,t) (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol)

Reentrancy in OHC_Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol#510-530):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(validPurchase()) (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol#517)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/17/0x729c2bac7ffef4330607e49c67364c28e8515c9d.sol#521-525)
